name: Drumy Lite
description:
- Enjoy a new rhythmic and musical experience with Drumy Lite

- Brace yourself for an innovative gameplay, designed to train your rhythm sense.

Drumy Lite includes nine free levels. You will start with two playing areas colored in red and yellow, and as you progress another, third area in the middle will be added with a lower drum tone.

Drumy Lite is the free version of the game Drumy. Its sole purpose is to deliver a pure musical and gaming experience. You won't find any ads or other disturbances during your play.

More info about Drumy and Drumy Lite: http://creatub.com/drumy
